overview: An island has been decimated by a volcanic eruption and the few survivors escape to a nearby island. Led by Rutolo, they know that their new home is equally susceptible to such a catastrophe via its own volcano, but they are unable to convince the current inhabitants of Island #2 to flee with them to a mainland.

production_companies.name: Ministero del Turismo e dello Spettacolo

title: Under the Sign of Scorpio
